title: Bihar results: 'Jab tak samose mein aalu rahega' - why you never ignore Lalu
content: Lalu Prasad Yadav's influence persists in Bihar politics, even without his participation in the 2025 elections. His legacy, marked by both 'jungle raj' criticism and support for marginalized communities, continues to shape electoral strategies. Both ruling and opposition alliances invoke his name, highlighting his enduring relevance. Lalu remains a central figure in Bihar's political discourse.

title: Women, welfare and the ‘phoenix’ CM: How Nitish-led NDA crushed MGB in Bihar - takeaways
content: Bihar's 2025 assembly election saw the NDA secure a decisive mandate, driven by women-centric welfare, caste recalibration, and strong organization. Nitish Kumar's leadership, PM Modi's appeal, and Chirag Paswan's performance were key factors. The results highlight the enduring impact of welfare schemes and women voters, while exposing the limitations of new political entrants and the INDIA bloc's disarray.

title: Blue Origin joins SpaceX: Bezos receives Musk's 'message' after spaceflight milestone
content: Blue Origin has achieved a major feat by successfully landing its colossal New Glenn rocket booster at sea, a feat previously mastered only by SpaceX. This second attempt's success, witnessed by Elon Musk's congratulations, signifies a crucial step in the commercial space race.  The reusable booster promises to significantly cut launch costs for future missions.

title: Bihar election results: Top winners and losers
content: Bihar's 2025 election sees the NDA secure a decisive victory, with Nitish Kumar and PM Modi emerging as key winners. Women voters played a pivotal role, driving turnout and influencing the mandate. Conversely, Tejashwi Yadav faced a significant setback, failing to convert momentum into votes, while Rahul Gandhi and Prashant Kishor also experienced disappointing results.

title: 63% of Indian Managers say AI training will be core team responsibility within five years
content: India’s leading companies are rapidly integrating artificial intelligence to transform the workplace. According to Microsoft’s 2025 Work Trend Index—India, 93% of leaders plan to use AI agents within 12–18 months to enhance productivity and workforce capacity. Frontier firms are redesigning operations around human-agent collaboration, prioritizing upskilling, agility, and innovation to shape India’s AI-powered future of work.

title: Apple device users warned: Update your devices right away; security flaws found
content: CERT-In has issued a high-severity warning for numerous Apple products due to multiple vulnerabilities. These flaws could allow attackers to execute arbitrary code, gain elevated privileges, or access sensitive information. Users are urged to update their devices immediately to the latest software versions to patch these critical security risks.

title: From litti chokha to jalebis: Streets burst into celebrations as NDA crosses 200 mark
content: The National Democratic Alliance (NDA) surged past 200 seats in the Bihar Assembly polls, triggering jubilant celebrations at BJP and JD(U) offices. Trends showed the NDA, led by Nitish Kumar and Narendra Modi, dominating the opposition. This election marked a significant test for Nitish Kumar, with high voter turnout and a historic lack of violence.

title: Ind vs SA: Yashasvi throws his wicket away; Gautam's reaction says it all
content: The stadium fell silent as Yashasvi Jaiswal stood momentarily in disbelief before trudging off for 12 off 27 balls, an innings that included three boundaries. It was the wicket Jansen had been relentlessly searching for, and it gave South Africa an early lift.

title: SIR, vote chori: Oppn looks for excuses as NDA eyes supermajority in Bihar
content: Early Bihar election trends show the NDA leading significantly, prompting the Mahagathbandhan to renew "vote chori" accusations. Congress leaders allege the Election Commission colluded with the ruling party, citing alleged irregularities and money distribution. They frame the outcome as a contest between the ECI and the people of Bihar, awaiting final results.

title: Anthropic warns of Chinese hackers misusing Claude: Spying on firms globally
content: A Chinese state-sponsored hacker group exploited Anthropic's Claude AI for a major cyber espionage campaign.  The attackers used the AI's autonomous capabilities to infiltrate systems of over 30 global targets. They harvested credentials and exfiltrated sensitive data. This marks a significant shift in cyberattack execution, with AI performing most of the tasks.

title: Ind vs SA: Boom boom! Jasprit Bumrah sets new record!
content: Jasprit Bumrah was unplayable on Friday, ripping through South Africa's batting lineup with a stunning 5 for 27. His fiery spell dismantled the visitors after a strong start, leading to their collapse for a mere 159.

title: Bihar election: Maithili in lead; Khesari, Ritesh struggle - how celebrity candidates fared
content: In the Bihar Assembly polls, singer Maithili Thakur is poised for victory on a BJP ticket, while actor-singer Khesari Lal Yadav and singer Ritesh Pandey are trailing. The ruling NDA is heading towards a landslide victory, leading in over 200 seats.

title: Jubilee Hills bypoll: Naveen Yadav wrests for Congress with 24,000-vote win
content: Congress candidate V. Naveen Yadav secured a decisive victory in the Jubilee Hills Assembly by-poll. He defeated BRS contender Maganti Sunitha Gopinath by a margin of approximately 24,658 votes. This win strengthens Chief Minister A. Revanth Reddy's leadership and consolidates Congress's position in Hyderabad. The BRS faces challenges after this outcome. Muslim voters played a crucial role in the election.

title: Bihar election results: Maithili Thakur headed for big debut
content: Folk singer Maithili Thakur has achieved a historic victory for the BJP in Bihar's Alinagar constituency, marking the party's first win from the seat. The 25-year-old singer, known for her traditional folk performances and strong social media presence, defeated RJD's Binod Mishra, potentially becoming the state's youngest MLA.

title: Veteran actress Kamini Kaushal passes away at 98; family requests privacy
content: Veteran actress Kamini Kaushal, a beloved icon of Hindi cinema, has passed away at 98. Her illustrious career spanned over seven decades, beginning with the Cannes award-winning 'Neecha Nagar' in 1946. Known for her grace and talent, she delivered memorable performances in numerous films, leaving an indelible mark on Indian cinema.

title: Where is Jan Suraaj? Prashant Kishor’s party’s ambitious debut fails to show up in trends
content: Early Bihar election trends show the NDA leading significantly, with the Mahagathbandhan trailing. Prashant Kishor's Jan Suraaj party, despite contesting over 200 seats, has shown no substantial traction in the initial results. Exit polls had also predicted a dismal performance for Jan Suraaj.

title: Tarn Taran bypoll result: AAP retains assembly seat with Harmeet Sandhu
content: Tarn Taran Assembly by-election in Punjab recorded a voter turnout of 60.95%, a slight decrease from the 2022 assembly elections. Polling was peaceful across 222 booths, with the results to be declared today. The by-election, necessitated by the death of an AAP MLA, is a key test for the ruling party's popularity.

title: Bumrah, Pant's 'bauna' remark on Temba Bavuma caught on stump mic - Watch
content: Jasprit Bumrah's impressive bowling spell in the first Test against South Africa was overshadowed by a controversial on-field exchange. A remark allegedly made by either Bumrah or Rishabh Pant about Temba Bavuma's height during a DRS discussion went viral, sparking debate online.  South Africa won the toss and opted to bat.

title: First gold in 18 years: India stuns Korea; scripts history in recurve archery
content: India's men's recurve archery team clinched a historic gold at the Asian Championships, defeating South Korea in a thrilling shoot-off after an 18-year drought. This remarkable victory, part of India's four gold and two silver haul, saw the team fight back from a deficit. Coach Rahul Banerjee hailed the win, with the next target set on the Asian Games.

title: Delhi blast: 2 Al-Falah-trained Kashmiri doctors held; police search Kanpur, Hapur campuses
content: Authorities have detained two Kashmiri doctors in Uttar Pradesh as part of the investigation into a Jaish-e-Mohammed module linked to a Delhi car blast. Dr. Mohammed Arif Mir, a cardiology postgraduate in Kanpur, and Dr. Farooq Ahmad Dar, an assistant professor in Hapur, were apprehended. Both had previously studied at Al-Falah University.

title: Heartwarming! Viv Richards blesses Unmukt Chand's son - Watch
content: Former Delhi cricketer Unmukt Chand met West Indies legend Sir Vivian Richards in Florida. Richards blessed Chand's son, Krishay, a moment Chand called unforgettable. Richards also advised Chand to play cricket with the same heart regardless of the country or franchise.

title: Leopard attack stuns Bengaluru safari visitors: Big cat strikes through bus window — watch
content: A leopard attacked a safari bus at Bannerughatta Biological Park, injuring a tourist. Authorities have indefinitely suspended non-AC bus safaris for a safety review. This marks the second leopard-related incident in three months, prompting renewed concerns about visitor safety within the enclosure.

title: Bihar polls: Tej Pratap Yadav stares at defeat in Mahua; LJP(RV) takes lead in key seat
content: Tej Pratap Yadav is trailing in fourth place in the Mahua constituency as Bihar Assembly election counting begins. LJP (Ram Vilas) candidate Sanjay Kumar Singh is currently leading. This comes amid controversy over an RJD leader's warning to election officials, for which an FIR has been filed.

title: Pakistan taking no chance! SL team gets President-level security - Watch
content: Pakistan has deployed its army and paramilitary forces to ensure the safety of the Sri Lankan cricket team following a deadly suicide bombing in Islamabad. Despite initial player concerns, comprehensive security assurances from Pakistani authorities have led the team to continue their tour. This comes amid heightened security and memories of a past attack on the Sri Lankan team.

title: Danapur: BJP’s Ram Kripal Yadav pulls ahead, extends lead over RJD’s Rit Lal Roy
content: In the Danapur constituency, BJP's Ram Kripal Yadav is steadily extending his lead after 29 rounds of counting, positioning himself advantageously against the RJD's Rit Lal Roy. This seat, located in Patna district, has experienced a dynamic political atmosphere, with historical patterns of fluctuating party support.

title: Bihar polls: NDA heading for landslide victory; trends show 'susashan' winning
content: The NDA is surging ahead in Bihar's assembly elections, with early trends indicating a strong mandate powered by Nitish Kumar and Narendra Modi. This election, seen as a test for Kumar, appears to counter recent questions about shifting alliances and voter fatigue. Counting for all 243 seats is underway, with results expected by evening.

title: '5-phase plan’: How Al-Falah doctors built nationwide plot to 'avenge' Babri demolition
content: A chilling plot to unleash coordinated blasts in six cities on December 6, the Babri Masjid demolition anniversary, has been uncovered by investigators. Arrested members of a Jaish-e-Mohammad-linked module revealed plans to "avenge" the 1992 event, with a five-phase strategy involving IED assembly and target reconnaissance. Security has been heightened across multiple regions.

title: Dampa Bypoll: MNF's R Lalthangliana wins against BJP's Lalhmingthanga Sailo
content: Counting is underway for the Dampa Assembly by-election, with an impressive 83.07% voter turnout recorded. The results, expected by Friday forenoon, will determine the fate of five candidates from major parties including BJP, INC, and MNF. Postal ballots are yet to be added to the final tally.

title: Gold price prediction: What's the outlook for today? Here's what investors should do
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are exhibiting a bearish bias, with a short-term consolidation expected. Technical indicators suggest fading upside momentum, with resistance at ₹1,27,200 and support at ₹1,26,100.

title: Mahua election result: Tej Pratap Yadav slips to fourth
content: Vote counting begins today in Mahua, where Tej Pratap Yadav is making a high-stakes bid to reclaim the seat he debuted in. He's contesting as an independent against RJD's incumbent Mukesh Kumar Raushan and LJP's Sanjay Singh, aiming to disrupt the existing political landscape.

title: Security concerns! Pak cricket chief Naqvi assures Lankan players - Watch
content: Pakistan Cricket Board chief met with players amid heightened security following a recent bombing near the Sri Lankan team's hotel. Despite initial player concerns, Sri Lanka Cricket confirmed the tour's continuation after PCB assured enhanced safety measures. An old video of Kusal Mendis praising security has resurfaced, underscoring the delicate situation.

title: Bullseye! At 80, ex-armyman Maha Singh finds new targets — qualifies for nationals
content: An 80-year-old retired army sepoy, Maha Singh, is making waves at the India Open shooting competition. Despite taking up the sport just a year ago, he has qualified for the National Championships and trains daily, commuting 80 km for practice. Singh's dedication and physical fitness are an inspiration to many.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens below 25,800; BSE Sensex down almost 300 points
content: Stock market today: The BSE Sensex concluded at 84,562.78, up by 84.11 points (0.10 per cent), whilst the NSE Nifty finished at 25,910.05, gaining 30.90 points (0.12 per cent).

title: Darbhanga: BJP's Sanjay Saraogi takes lead against VIP's Umesh Sahani
content: In Bihar's Darbhanga, BJP's Sanjay Saraogi is leading in a tight contest against VIP's Umesh Sahani and Pushpam Priya. The constituency saw a significant surge in voter turnout this year, reaching 78.12%. Saraogi, the sitting MLA, is aiming for a third consecutive victory in this urban hub.

title: Bihar election results: Key fights to watch out for; big verdict today
content: Bihar's high-stakes elections conclude with results due Friday. Exit polls hint at an NDA return, with all eyes on the counting. The article highlights key constituencies like Raghopur, Madhepura, and Alinagar, featuring prominent political figures and intriguing contests.  Internal INDIA bloc 'friendly fights' between Congress and RJD/CPI(ML) could impact the outcome.

title: Anta bypoll 2025 result: BJP’s Morpal Suman leads in early trends
content: The Anta Assembly by-election in Rajasthan sees a direct contest between Congress candidate Pramod Jain Bhaya and BJP's Morpal Suman, with Congress rebel Naresh Meena also in the fray. The bypoll, held after the disqualification of a BJP MLA, recorded a high voter turnout of 80.21%.

title: Russia launches missiles, drones on Ukraine; every district in Kyiv under 'massive' attack
content: Kyiv experienced a 'massive' attack early Friday morning, with air defense forces actively engaged. Explosions were reported across the city, leading to injuries and fires in residential buildings. This escalation follows recent intensified attacks by Moscow on the Ukrainian capital.

title: 1st Test: Pant, Jurel in playing XI - who is missing out?
content: South Africa have won the toss and elected to bat first in the opening Test against India. The Proteas are aiming to break their 25-year winless streak in India. Both teams have announced their playing XIs. India's captain Shubman Gill expressed confidence in the pitch. South Africa's captain Temba Bavuma highlighted the challenge of playing in India.

title: T.N. Defence Industrial Corridor attracts investments worth ₹29,000 crore
content: According to V. Vinayagam, senior vice-president of the Tamil Nadu Industrial Development Corporation (TIDCO), the Central government has set an investment target of ₹10,000 crore for the current fiscal for the defence corridor in the State

title: Bihar Assembly election results: NOTA’s share up from 2020 but much lower than 2015
content: The number of people who had chosen NOTA in 2015 was 9.4 lakh out of 3.8 crore people who voted, which comes to 2.48%

title: Newbie Jan Suraaj Party falters in Bihar Assembly elections
content: JSP fails to win a single seat in Bihar Assembly election; Prashant Kishor’s new party sees poor debut despite high-profile campaign

title: India, Canada strengthen economic ties on critical minerals, trade and investment
content: Both the countries also agreed to “identify and expand investment and trading opportunities in aerospace and dual-use capabilities partnerships”

title: Madras High Court judge recuses from hearing actor Vishal’s appeal against Lyca Productions
content: Justice G. Jayachandran says, he had already dealt with Lyca’s civil suit against the actor as a single judge and hence, does not want to hear the appeal

title: Bihar Assembly elections 2025: Women’s vote, governance record and alliance cohesion drive NDA victory
content: High women turnout, NDA governance record and BJP-JD(U)-LJP coordination underpin sweeping Bihar election win

title: IAF trainer aircraft crashes near Chennai; pilot ejects safely
content: Local residents said a loud noise was heard on the Thiruporur-Nemmeli Road that connects East Coast Road (ECR) with Rajiv Gandhi Salai at around 2 p.m. where the aircraft crashed near a salt factory compound wall

title: Watch: After the Delhi and Islamabad blasts, is a fresh conflict brewing in the region? | Worldview
content: After the deadly bomb blast in Delhi, a blast in Islamabad. Six months after Operation Sindoor was launched, are tensions in South Asia rising again? And what are the diplomatic impacts of the investigation’s international trail?

title: Singapore-based man arrested from Delhi in ₹32-crore bank fraud case: CBI
content: The fraud case stems from a complaint by the Punjab National Bank, which alleged that ₹31.60 crores was swindled by Frost Infrastructure and Energy Pvt Ltd (FIEL)

title: Bihar Assembly results: Congress leaders raise vote chori following the Mahagathbandhan rout
content: Congress leader Ashok Gehlot claimed that pension payments and cash transfers continued unabated during the campaign period

title: Bihar election result sends important signal to poll-bound States: Vanathi Srinivasan
content: The BJP leader said a few more parties were likely to join the NDA in Tamil Nadu in the coming months

title: Bihar Assembly elections 2025: Chirag Paswan strengthens footing in NDA with LJP(RV)’s strong showing
content: LJP(RV) leads on 19 seats in Bihar Assembly elections; Chirag-Nitish thaw signals consolidation within NDA

title: Bihar election results 2025: JD(U)’s Anant Kumar Singh, arrested in murder case, wins Mokama
content: The ex-MLA, who is winning in Mokama, is in jail after being arrested for the murder of Dular Chand Yadav, a poll worker of the Jan Suraaj Party.

title: Ambaji marble secures GI tag for its distinctive white stone
content: “Ambaji marble is known for its unique shine and beauty, and it has been especially used in the construction of religious sites for many years,” said Chief Minister Bhupendra Patel

title: V. Maitreyan, the first Brahmin to hold organisational post in DMK
content: He is among a small number of well-known Brahmins who have chosen to support or join a party traditionally associated with atheism and anti-Brahminism positions.

title: T.N. police arrest four agents who recruited for cyber scam compound in Myanmar
content: The Tamil Nadu Cyber Crime Wing recently launched an operation called ‘Blue Triangle’, which led to the identification and arrest of a gang of four agents among the 35 workers repatriated to India earlier this month

title: Shashi Tharoor says he was not invited to Bihar campaign, calls for review of Congress defeat
content: “The party has a responsibility to study in detail the causes behind the setback. ‘Remember,’ we were not the senior partner in the alliance, and the RJD also has to look carefully at its own performance,” says Shashi Tharoor

title: Bihar election results: NDA heads for landslide victory; leaders laud PM Modi’s leadership
content: Speaking at the CII Partnership Summit 2025 in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh CM Chandrababu Naidu asserted that the NDA would win “at least 200 seats

title: Four Flipkart delivery hub staff booked for allegedly misappropriating 331 premium phones worth ₹1.61 crore in Kerala
content: According to FIR, the accused booked mobile phones on Flipkart’s online platform through the company’s application using different phone numbers and fake addresses. When the phones were delivered to the hubs, they falsely reported them as missing

title: Farmers demand permission to cultivate 126-variety paddy in rabi season
content: the 126 variety is a short-duration, high-yielding crop suitable for rabi, says A.P. Rythu Sangam leader

title: A cross-continental bike ride inspired a zero-cost, AR-powered The Gratitude Forest in Kerala
content: Discover The Gratitude Forest, an AR-powered storytelling installation in Wayanad, Kerala created by Sunil Kaushik and Yuka Yokozawa

title: Delhi Red Fort blast: Three more arrested in Assam for social media posts ‘supporting the explosion’
content: State government has adopted a zero-tolerance approach against anyone showing support for the attack, says Himanta Biswa Sarma

title: Bihar 2025 election results: How alliance consolidation, vote fragmentation gave the NDA a landslide win
content: The ruling coalition’s victory margin of over 200 seats was built on a 10-percentage-point vote share advantage and the effective collapse of multi-cornered contests

title: In pictures | Bihar election results: NDA wins big
content: As trends indicated NDA heading towards victory, celebrations began in the state. Nitish Kumar's JD(U) has made big gains in 2025 Bihar assembly elections compared to the 2020 elections.

title: Bihar election results 2025: How are candidates faring in key constituencies?
content: As the results are announced for the Assembly elections in Bihar on November 14, 2025, we take a look at key battles and winning candidates in some core constituencies.

content: Petitioner NGO also questions the insistence on compulsory muzzling of pet dogs whenever they are taken to public places for a walk or other purposes

title: RJD, Congress responsible for ‘dividing minority votes’: AIMIM's Waris Pathan amid vote counting in Bihar
content: Mr. Pathan argued that his party's lead in a few seats in the Bihar Assembly election results was a "huge boost" and expressed hope for winning in at least seven constituencies

title: Kerala local body polls 2025: State Election Commission publishes election notification
content: Nominations for the two-phase elections in December can be filed till 3 p.m. on November 21, which will be followed by their scrutiny on November 22

title: Dodgers' Ohtani becomes 4-time unanimous MVP
content: Dodgers star Shohei Ohtani won his fourth MVP in five seasons, all of them in unanimous fashion, beating out the Phillies' Kyle Schwarber and the Mets' Juan Soto for the 2025 NL award.

title: Maye keeps NFL-best Pats hot amid 'MVP' chants
content: Drake Maye heard chants of "MVP" after leading the Patriots to a 27-14 win over the Jets on Thursday night that boosted them to an NFL-best 9-2 record.

title: MLS switching schedule to align with world soccer
content: The MLS board of governors voted Thursday to align with the international soccer calendar by shifting the regular season to a summer-to-spring campaign, beginning in 2027.

title: John Force, 76, retires after NHRA-best 157 wins
content: John Force, a 16-time Funny Car champion and the face of NHRA drag racing for nearly four decades, has formally retired.

title: 14 charged in betting ring involving athletes
content: Fourteen people were charged for their roles in a multimillion-dollar illegal sports betting ring that involved college athletes and had links to organized crime, New Jersey authorities announced Thursday.

title: Ex-'Last Chance U' coach shot on Oakland campus
content: John Beam, the former Laney Eagles head coach who was featured in the Netflix documentary series "Last Chance U," was taken to a hospital after he was shot on campus Thursday.

title: Warriors' Curry, Under Armour ending partnership
content: Stephen Curry and Under Armour are ending their long-standing partnership, and sources told ESPN that Curry is expected to have freedom to wear other brands over the next year and pursue new partnership deals.

title: 🏈 2026 NFL draft: Five-team race for top pick
content: Five NFL teams have at least 5% odds to land the No. 1 pick in 2026, per our Football Power Index -- the Titans, Browns, Jets, Saints and Raiders.

content: Baseball's best collected their hardware this week. We have everything to know about all the winners.

content: The Indianapolis Clowns selected Bradley at No. 1 as part of the inaugural Banana Ball draft Thursday night.

content: We're seven months from the start of the 2026 World Cup. While qualification wraps up, our writers answer a simple question: Who's winning it right now?

content: Pro tennis players often have very little time off before the next season begins -- and it can jeopardize their physical and mental health.﻿

content: Recovery is part of the job for every soccer player, but it's much more complicated when crossing the Atlantic every six weeks to play for the U.S.

content: A man and his son were allegedly shot dead in Baliyana village in Rohtak due to an old rivalry, and the three accused were absconding in the incident, says police

content: Congress maintains its winning ways in byelection after wresting the Secunderabad Cantonment Assembly seat in 2024

content: In the past Assembly polls, the State witnessed violence, deaths and re-election, official data shows

content: The competition included advanced bomb disposal drills, IED detection and neutralisation tasks, and complex scenario-based exercises designed to test real-world readiness

title: Arjuna awardee wrestler Pooja Dhanda ties nuptial knot
content: “Will continue to be actively involved in wrestling after marriage, focusing on coaching and nurturing young athletes to help them win medals at future Olympics,” says Pooja Dhanda

title: Bihar election 2025 results: Women voters surged to help JD(U), driven by Nitish Kumar’s welfare schemes
content: JD(U)’s welfare outreach to women voters delivers decisive edge as party’s vote share surges to 23.8% in districts where women dominated polling, compared to just 15.7% where gender parity prevailed

title: Stray dog beaten to death, dumped in garbage bin; tea shop owner arrested in Chennai
content: An elderly man visiting the accused’s tea shop was chased by the dog. When the accused tried to drive it away, the dog attempted to bite him, police said

title: Bihar poll results won’t have any bearing on Bengal, claims TMC
content: TMC spokesperson Kunal Ghosh said the Bihar poll results also showed again that the Congress failed in its Opposition to BJP

content: Yadav had failed to comply with the bail condition imposed by the Madras High Court to deposit ₹100 crore

content: Union Minister of Industries & Commerce Piyush Goyal said the NDA is poised for a comfortable victory in the Bihar elections

title: NIA nabs suspected mastermind behind Iran-based organ trade in Kerala
content: Reportedly apprehended on his arrival from Iran on November 8, he was produced before a court in Kochi and has since been remanded in NIA custody till November 19. He is currently being interrogated by NIA

content: The HAM party chief attributed the NDA's performance in the elections to CM Nitish Kumar's good governance

content: Much of the Act goes into force in late 2026–mid-2027; a much-resisted Right to Information Act, 2005 amendment is in force immediately

content: The Bench ordered that Union Ministries of Finance and Cooperation be made parties to the present proceedings, and sought their responses to the plea by November 17

title: BJP, Congress spar after Jeffrey Epstein mails refer to invitation to Hardeep Puri
content: The U.S. Democrat oversight committee released emails where Jeffrey Epstein mentioned international leaders he invited to events

title: CII Summit: Visakhapatnam is growth corridor of Andhra Pradesh, says Nara Lokesh
content: “We are quickly giving permissions and lands for investments coming to Andhra Pradesh,” Nara Lokesh said

title: ‘People of Bihar voted for justice, development’: Giriraj Singh projects NDA's landslide victory
content: Congress MP Manickam Tagore today alleged that vote deletion happened for voters who support the opposition, saying that democracy can't survive if the playing field is uneven

title: Rahul Bajaj skilling centres in Andhra Pradesh
content: “Andhra Pradesh, with its 1,000 km coastline, is becoming a gateway for Trade, Technology, and Innovation,” Sanjiv Bajaj, chairman and MD of Bajaj Finserv said

title: Dip in night temperature in Yadgir forces people to stay indoors for extended hours
content: Between November 9 and 13, the day temperature averaged 29 to 32 degree Celsius and the night temperature averaged 17 to 18 degree Celsius

title: Andhra CM Chandrababu Naidu gives new definition to Vizag, describing ‘V’ for ‘Vision’
content: Posting on X, Andhra CM Chandrababu Naidu has given a new definition to VIZAG, describing it as V-Vision, I-Innovation, Z-Zeal, A-Aspiration and G-Growth

title: Ericsson opens R&D unit to drive 5G software development in Bengaluru
content: According to the Swedish firm, the initiative is part of Ericsson’s broader R&D expansion in India, including the growth of ASIC (Application-Specific Integrated Circuit) development

title: J&K bypoll results: BJP retains Nagrota seat, PDP pulls off surprise win from NC bastion Budgam in J&K
content: In Budgam, PDP’s Aga Syed Muntazir was leading by a margin of more than 2,000 votes over his nearest rival and National Conference (NC) candidate Aga Syed Mehmood

title: Survey of India, Central University of Karnataka sign MoU to strengthen geospatial studies, training
content: CUK Vice-Chancellor Prof. Battu Satyanarayana said that collaboration between academia, research institutions and industries was the need of the hour for the country’s progress

title: Crime and punishment
content: In 2015, a brutal murder straight out of a movie script shook Andhra Pradesh. It was the murder of the Mayor of Chittoor — a crime that blended politics with personal vendetta. After nearly a decade, the judgment that followed was equally strong, distinct and unprecedented: for the first time, five of the accused were sentenced to death. K. Umashanker goes back to trace what happened that day and how the investigation unfolded

title: Hyderabad’s lakes rise from rubble, but not without ripples
content: The Hyderabad Disaster Response and Asset Protection Agency, simply known as HYDRAA, has emerged as both saviour and disruptor, reclaiming encroached lakes even as its methods draw scrutiny. The ambitious restoration efforts aim to improve water quality, enhance flood control and boost groundwater recharge. But will this mark real change or end up as just another cycle of revival and neglect? Swathi Vadlamudi finds out

title: For a safe rail journey
content: Kerala is yet to recover from the horrifying news of a young woman being pushed out of a moving train and critically injured, the second such incident to be reported from the State. Aathira Haridas and photo journalist Thulasi Kakkat travel on the New Delhi-Thiruvananthapuram Kerala Express, the train on which the young victim travelled, to understand the safety concerns of women passengers

title: Rajasthan’s Anta bypoll results: Congress’ Pramod Bhaya wins
content: Independent candidate Naresh Meena was trailing, while the BJP candidate, Morpal Saman, was in the third position

title: Bihar results do not correspond to ground reality: Dipankar Bhattacharya
content: The final list of SIR pegged the total number of voters in Bihar at nearly 7.42 crore names, but the post-poll ECI press note puts the figure at 7,45,26,858

title: Bihar election results 2025: ‘It will be people’s victory,’ says Tejashwi Yadav; vote counting underway
content: The opposition INDIA bloc in Bihar, on Thursday (November 13), voiced apprehension of a “conspiracy” during counting of votes for the State Assembly polls, allegedly at the behest of the ruling NDA

title: Kerala local body polls: BDJS looks to shed poor-performer tag, bargains for more seats this time
content: BDJS leaders feel that the party shall be given its due credit for the impressive performance of many BJP candidates in the 2024 general election in the State, especially in constituencies such as  Alappuzha, which has a sizable number of voters belonging to the Ezhava community

title: Riding on pro-farmer push by LDF govt., KC(M) eyes bigger role in the front with Kerala local body polls
content: Pinarayi government’s legislative and policy moves have breathed a new life into the pro-farmer politics espoused by KC(M), which CPI(M) considers as a vital cog in its expansion strategy for Central Travancore’s traditionally anti-Left pockets. However, CPI seems sceptical about the regional party’s  attempts to project itself as the coalition’s second-in-command

title: Tarn Taran bypoll results: AAP’s Harmeet Sandhu wins; BJP and Congress lose deposit
content: Harmeet Singh Sandhu, who joined the AAP days ahead of the bypoll, won by a margin of 12,091 votes, defeating his nearest rival and SAD candidate Sukhwinder Kaur

title: Mizoram’s Dampa bypoll results: Opposition MNF retains seat, R. Lalthangliana wins bypoll by 562 votes
content: The bypoll was necessitated following the death of incumbent MNF legislator Lalrintluanga Sailo in July.

title: Jubilee Hills byelection result: Congress’s Naveen Yadav wins by margin of 24,729 votes
content: Naveen Yadav was leading by 47 votes in round 1; 2,995 votes in round 2; 6,012 votes in round 3 and 9,559 votes in round 4

title: For Assam tea, erratic climate and stagnant prices present a crisis
content: Tea thrives within narrow environmental parameters, and climate change threatens to take them away from the areas where it is currently cultivated

title: Ghatshila bypoll results: JMM’s Somesh Soren in the lead; vote counting in progress
content: The bypoll has turned into a prestige battle for both the ruling JMM and the BJP, even though the election result will not have any major impact on the Hemant Soren government

title: Delhi car blast accused Umar Nabi’s house demolished in Pulwama
content: Security forces carried out the demolition during the intervening night of November 13-14; Meanwhile, Mirwaiz appeals Centre to relook at the Kashmir approach

title: Holding up GLASS to India; securing stewardship to tackle AMR
content: Antimicrobial resistance in India is a ‘serious and escalating threat’, with resistance rates among the highest in the world; comprehensive action is needed, including surveillance, rational antibiotic use, public awareness, and sustained funding to reduce AMR and protect community health

title: Bengaluru traffic gridlock: Is there light at the end of the tunnel?
content: Tenders for building the north-south corridor of the twin tunnel project are being finalised, and civil work is likely to begin soon. Rishita Khanna looks at lapses in planning this ambitious project, and examines key questions on the cost of commute and the ability to ease congestion

title: Why MLS is changing to summer-spring schedule with a winter break
content: MLS will soon adopt a schedule that will run from the summer through the spring, but how will the league manage matches in frigid winters?

title: Ranked: Europe's 10 worst transfers from this summer -- and the 5 best
content: After three months, we rank the 10 worst transfers and the 5 best from the summer of 2025 in the Premier League, LaLiga and the rest of Europe.

title: Don't be surprised if ... Julius Randle leads the Timberwolves in fantasy points
content: Eric Karabell forecasts what to expect from Julius Randle, Russell Westbrook and Andrew Nembhard in the months ahead.

title: Children’s Day: Fostering inquiry in children in the age of internet
content: With the advent of the Internet, memoisable facts are available at a single click and are no longer a very valuable skill

title: Crimes involving transgender community members on the rise
content: "This has become an organised crime, where a few individuals, mainly hijra leaders, exploit younger members, collect money by forcing them into begging, extortion or sex work,” said a transgender activist

title: Pradhan inaugurates Ahmedabad International Book Festival, urges youth to cultivate reading habit
content: Highlighting the importance of blending traditional reading with technology, Mr. Pradhan said the younger generation should embrace both printed and digital formats

title: Children’s Day: Schools must speak the child’s language and not the more remote ‘standard’ language
content: In multilingual and multi-dialectal Hyderabad–Karnataka region, the gap between classroom language and home speech continues to hold children back

title: Bihar election 2025 results LIVE updates: NDA heading for a landslide win; Mahagathbandhan distant second
content: RJD's Tejashwi Yadav leading by 10,276 votes in Raghopur seat; 'victory of good governance has been achieved', says PM Modi

title: 200 Paar In Bihar: NDA Thrashes Mahagathbandhan, PK A Damp Squib
content: The ruling NDA is set for another term in power in Bihar with a landslide win, powered by its caste math and the personal popularity of Chief Minister Nitish Kumar. The Opposition Grand Alliance is in a tailspin with one of its lowest scores.

title: Bihar Results LIVE: These Bihar Ministers Became MLAs In 1990, Now Headed To 9th Straight Win
content: They became MLAs in 1990, when Tejashwi Yadav was three months old. Since then, they have won every election in Bihar from the same seats. BJP's Prem Kumar and JDU's Bijendra Prasad Yadav are now set for ninth straight win from Gaya Town and Supaul

title: Bihar Election Results Live: Tejashwi Yadav Wins By Over 11,000 Votes, PM Lauds 'Unprecedented Victory' For NDA
content: Election Results 2025 LIVE Updates: The NDA in Bihar appeared to be headed towards a thumping victory and Chief Minister Nitish Kumar seemed prepared to secure a fifth consecutive term. Tejashwi Yadav won by over 11,000 votes.

title: On Poll Debut, Actor Khesari Lal Yadav Trails From Chapra By 6,000 Votes
content: Khesari Lal Yadav's electoral debut seems set to come a cropper, with the Bhojpuri superstar, who is trailing the BJP's Chhoti Kumari by nearly 3,000 votes from the Chhapra constituency in Bihar.

title: Bihar Results LIVE: Why Rs 10,000 Is Not Sole Factor Behind Women's Bumper Support For NDA
content: As the NDA preps for a victory party and the Opposition's Mahagathbandhan stares at a rout in the Bihar Assembly election, a big question is which factors turned what was likely to be a close contest into an NDA sweep

title: Assembly Bypolls Result Live Updates: Congress, BJP, PDP Register Key Victories In Assembly Bypolls
content: The counting of votes for the recent Assembly by-elections reveals a mixed outcome, with both the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) and the Congress marking notable victories and leads.

title: Indian Sikh Woman Goes Missing In Pakistan During Religious Visit
content: A woman Sikh pilgrim went missing from the group of devotees who had travelled to Pakistan on November 4 to celebrate the Parkash Purab (birth anniversary) of Guru Nanak Dev.

title: Those Who Practice Jungle Raj Won't Get Chance To Loot: Amit Shah On Bihar Results
content: Calling the NDA's mammoth win a victory for every Bihari who believes in 'Developed Bihar', Home Minister Amit Shah has said those who "practice jungle raj" will not get an opportunity to "loot" people any more.

title: "Good Governance, Development Won," Says PM Modi After NDA Sweeps Bihar Elections
content: Thanking the people of Bihar for handing a thumping victory to the NDA, Prime Minister Narendra Modi has said good governance and development have won in the state.

title: Probe Agency Issues Fresh Notice To Anil Ambani In Money Laundering Case
content: The Enforcement Directorate has issued fresh summons to Reliance Group chairman Anil Ambani to appear before it on November 17 in a FEMA case after he skipped his scheduled date on Friday.

title: Omar Abdullah's Party Loses Bypoll On Stronghold Seat He Vacated Last Year
content: In a huge setback for Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister Omar Abdullah, his party the National Conference (NC), has lost the bypoll in Budgam, the assembly seat he had vacated last year.

title: Bihar Election Results Live: Despite Massive Setback, Tejashwi Yadav's RJD Gets More Votes Than BJP, JDU
content: Bihar Election Results Live: The Tejashwi Yadav-led RJD has so far received more votes than its rivals -- the BJP and Nitish Kumar's JDU.

title: Indian Air Force Aircraft Crashes Near Chennai, Pilot Safe
content: An Indian Air Force aircraft which was on a routine training mission crashed near Tambaram here on Friday afternoon, officials said.

title: Domestic Help Steals Over Rs 8 Lakh Cash, Gold From Noida Employer's Home
content: The Delhi Police has arrested a domestic help, attempting to flee to Nepal, for allegedly stealing over Rs 8 lakh cash and gold jewellery worth around Rs 16 lakh from his employer's house in Noida, an official said on Friday.

title: Congress Trailing In All Seats On Rahul Gandhi's Bihar Yatra Route
content: The Bihar election results not just mark a serious drubbing for the Congress but also deal a major setback to Rahul Gandhi, who had crisscrossed the state earlier this year to convince voters that the BJP had been stealing votes.

title: Bihar Election Results LIVE: Osama Shahab, Son Of 'Bahubali' Shahabuddin, Leading From Raghunathpur Seat
content: Osama Shahab, the son of former Siwan MP and bahubali (strongman), late Mohammad Shahabuddin, is trailing from the Raghunathpur constituency in the Bihar Assembly elections.

title: In Pushpam Priya's Bihar Defeat, A Mask That Never Came Off
content: Pushpam Priya Choudhary, who heads the lesser-known Plurals Party in Bihar, had vowed to wear a mask in public until she wins an election. The day hasn't arrived yet.

title: Bihar Results LIVE: Tej Pratap Trails By Huge Margin As Chirag Paswan's Party Leads
content: Counting for the assembly elections in 243 seats in Bihar started on Friday. A majority mark of 122 seats is needed to win the election.

title: Landlord Kills Tenant Over Suspected Phone Hacking, Rare Coins Theft In Delhi: Cops
content: A man died and another was injured after their landlord allegedly assaulted them on suspicion of phone hacking and stealing rare coins from his collection, police said on Friday.

title: "Total Failure Of Organisation": Congress Leader On Bihar Result
content: As of 5 pm, the Congress won one seat and is leading in four of the 61 seats it contested in Bihar, a huge setback for the party that fought the assembly elections as part of the RJD-led Mahagathbandhan.

title: The Playbook: Lineup locks, Shadow Reports for Week 11
content: this column features score projections, over/unders, win probabilities, and, of course, easy digestible fantasy advice for seasonlong leagues and DFS . the weekly Shadow Reports: WR vs. CB Cheat Shutter explains why he is hesitant to start Jameson Williams in fantasy .

title: Last-minute pickups for Week 11: Joe Flacco, Devin Singletary among top options
content: this column will focus mostly on players rostered in fewer than 50% of ESPN leagues, with occasional exceptions . a volume thrower has put up big numbers over the past month, plus two signal-callers who provide rushing upside . there are a couple of pass-catching running backs in here as well .

title: How much will Barcelona miss Patri with Real Madrid, Chelsea to come?
content: Patri Guijarro, Alexia Putellas and Aitana Bonmat have won the UEFA women's champions league final in each of the last five seasons . the three-pronged midfielder is the glue that melds Barcelona's attacking unit and defensive structure together . Patri suffered a broken bone in her foot against AS Roma in October .

title: Italy eye yet another playoff for World Cup ticket
content: italy narrowly beat Israel 5-4 in their world cup qualifier . the pressure can be intense when big nations fail . azzurri haven't even missed out on the 2026 world cup yet .

title: CFP rankings release: See the second top 25 and bracket
content: the college football playoff committee will release its rankings each Tuesday through the end of the regular season . the final set of rankings will be released on Dec. 7 and those rankings will determine the final 12-team bracket . based on the CFP top 25 .

title: Week 12 preview: A wide-open ACC title race, key matchups and more
content: a slew of teams are teetering on a thin line between being in or out . this week features four ranked matchups that could shift the playoff picture dramatically . no. 9 Notre Dame's margin for error is zero as it faces a 7-2 Pittsburgh team .
